checkout.guest-customer-not-allowed: Subscriptions are not available for guest customers. Please log in or create an account.
checkout.subscription-plan-blocked: This subscription plan is unfortunately currently not available for you.
checkout.subscription-interval-blocked: This subscription interval is unfortunately currently not available for you.
checkout.subscription-product-mapping-missing: A product is not available for this subscription and has been removed from your cart.

confirm.submitDisclaimer: By clicking on "Submit order" you confirm that your subscription will be automatically renewed and your account will be automatically debited according to your payment method in accordance with the subscription price in the "Products" section. You can cancel your subscription at any time via the customer account. A minimum number of deliveries may apply.

account.subscriptionsSubtitle: Here you can find your subscriptions sorted by date.
account.subscriptionRemainingExecutionCount: %count% orders remaining until the end of the minimal subscription period.
